definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
UN convention against torture and cruel treatment (ratified by PRC in 1988)
pinyin: fan3 ku4 xing2 zhe2 mo2 gong1 yue1

sentences.english: Now is it okay that I'm going to torture you?
sentences.chinese: 这样我可以折磨你了吗？

sentences.english: Without the torment of the night's untruth.
sentences.chinese: 而不需面对夜晚虚伪的折磨。

sentences.english: The poor cat was kicked downstairs by the children.
sentences.chinese: 你折磨那只可怜的猫真缺德。

sentences.english: Melanie was so delicate. She couldn't stand two days of this pain .
sentences.chinese: 可是媚兰身体这样娇弱，她一定经不起两天的折磨。

sentences.english: Another painful affliction was boils, big and frequent.
sentences.chinese: 另一个折磨我的病痛是疖子，又大又频繁。

sentences.english: Love is a sweet tyranny, because the lover endures his torment willingly.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是甜蜜的虐政，情人心甘情愿地受它的折磨。

sentences.english: She was a typical victim of harassments, libel and sex abuse .
sentences.chinese: 她是这个折磨，诽谤和性骚扰的一个典型的受害者。

sentences.english: MOST students suffer from pre-exam nerves.
sentences.chinese: 对大部分学生来说，试前焦虑都是种折磨。

sentences.english: The whole thing wiped clean,complete perfect amnesia before I torture you.
sentences.chinese: 在我折磨你之前，一切都会被洗得干干净净。

sentences.english: Woman loves to think of man with her heart, it is tormented more easily by heart.
sentences.chinese: 女人爱用心去想男人，最易受心的折磨。

sentences.english: The killings are brutal, with victims ritually tortured.
sentences.chinese: 受害者通常在遭受仪式性的折磨之后被残酷杀害。

sentences.english: Similarly, bike riders often suffer from shoulder and back injuries and saddle-soreness.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，骑车者也被肩，背部疼痛和氨酸痛所折磨着。

sentences.english: Or which one do I want to not be tortured?
sentences.chinese: 或是我不希望哪一个被折磨？

sentences.english: As if he were in pain or in some torment of irresolution.
sentences.chinese: 好像他很痛苦或者是处在某种犹豫不决的折磨中。

sentences.english: A young boy who was employed by torturers saw the girl's terrible suffering.
sentences.chinese: 一个男孩，他被折磨者雇用，看到女孩可怕的遭遇。

definition: to be so in pain as to not want to live/to be so grieved as to wish one were dead
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to suffer enough from/to suffer all kinds of/to have one's fill of
to ravage/to devastate/to trample on/to violate
